description: During the summer of 2020 and early 2021 I worked as a junior software developer, implementing a new rendering system to reduce rendering time from 10 seconds plus, to less than 1 second. This was done by refactoring the code with modern libraries and changing how the data management system works. I led and developed this project myself with the help of my team.  Core skills included were software engineering, project management, agile skills and full stack programming.
During the summer of 2020 I worked at the Hastings District Council to implement and change-manage the installation of new communication technology and train 400 staff in its use.

Volunteer work was done with Te Pae Tawhiti to deploy technology to aid in the function of the organization. Te Pae Tawhiti serves as a social organisation devoted to connecting clients with services when needed. Te Pae Tawhiti has had a major impact on the lives of people living in Wairoa
